name: Hot Coffee (Koto)
description:
How much would you like to know. . .
. . .about the stranger standing in front of you?

Now's your chance.


Hot Coffee: A short Visual Novel about meeting someone new.



Credits:

Story/Art/Coding/Scripting by Koto

Music by Alcaknight

Transitions by LimitElta

Proofreading and Testing by Neonli


Made with Ren'Py

Support my games on Ko-fi

If you enjoy Hot Coffee(thank you!) please rate, leave comments and tell your friends about it!

Thank you <3
